com.imperio

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imperio.Option
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OptionHelp

    public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of this class represent a command-line option and contain all the necessary information for parsing it.
    Since:
    1.0.0

      • getInvocation

        public java.lang.String getInvocation()

        Returns this option's invocation form as it would specified on the command line.

        If this option has a long-form name, the invocation is "--abc" where "abc" is the long-form name of the option.

        If this option only has a character, the invocation is "-a", where "a" is the character.

        Returns:
        the invocation form of this option as it would be specified on the command line
        Since:
        1.0.0
